summary: After a near death experience, five Boys, all devoted AC/DC fans, make a pact to bury their best friend next to the grave of Bon Scott. 12 years later, having gone their different ways, they come together to fulfill the promise.
cast: Damon Gameau|Stephen Curry|Ryan Johnson|Callan Mulvey|Sam Worthington|Kestie Morassi|Rachel Gordon|Vito de Francesco|John Merkel|Jennifer Wall|Al Clark|John Sheerin|Judi Farr|Peter Longbottom|Jenny Dunstan|Nick Sheppard|Monica Main|Saskia Burmeister|Rory Walker|George Kapiniaris|Bill McCluskey|Alice Dale|Mark McAullay|Blythe Ashton|John Doyle|Nikki Visser|Naomi Robson|Karen Tan|Marie-Anne Keeffe|Andrea Mayes|Jason Gann|Shaun Angus Hall|Thelma Lumsden|Quentin Kenihan|Emma Jackson|Roy Billing|Jon Doust|Todd Shilkin|Paul Montague|Kingsley Judd|Deborah Kennedy|Jennifer McNamara|Bojana Novakovic|Chris Bent|James Morley|Gary Dunn|Duncan Mackintosh|Blair Jones|Jamie Williams|Peter Astachnowicz|Adam Boys|Michael Hartwich|Charlton Hill|Ella Hooper|Jason D. Jordan|Conrad Le Bron|Goran Ozanic|Josh Soutar|Derek Tong|Kevin Bloody Wilson
title: Thunderstruck
